FuncDef:
The description command in the traffic behavior view, you can add a description to the current traffic behavior to indicate the specific configuration and use of the traffic behavior.
The undo description command deletes the description of the traffic behavior.
By default, there is no description adding for the current configured traffic behavior.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the use of the traffic behavior.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters that may include spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-behavior-tb1] description This behavior is a test traffic behavior
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the name of a traffic behavior cannot provide the detailed information about the traffic behavior, you can add the detailed information through the description command.
Prerequisites
A traffic behavior is configured and the traffic behavior view is displayed.
